SEARCH
Package battleship.view

Schnittstelle IView

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
View
public interface IView
Interface defining the necessary methods for a view to be used by the controller in Battleship.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    drawBuildScreen(Grid compGrid, int direction)
    Draws the ship placement screen with the provided computer grid and direction indicator.
    void
    drawGameOverScreenPlayerLoose()
    Draws the game over screen for the computer's victory.
    void
    drawGameOverScreenPlayerWin()
    Draws the game over screen for the player's victory.
    void
    drawPlayScreen(Grid playerGrid, Grid computerGrid, Grid invPlayerShipsOnCompGrid, int[] shipLengths)
    Draws the main play screen with player and computer grids, as well as the invisible player ships on the computer grid.
    void
    drawShipsBuild(int[] shipLengths)
    Draws the ship placement screen with the lengths of the ships to be built.
    void
    drawStartScreen()
    Draws the start screen of the game.

  • Methodendetails

    • drawStartScreen

      void drawStartScreen()
      Draws the start screen of the game.

    • drawBuildScreen

      void drawBuildScreen(Grid compGrid, int direction)
      Draws the ship placement screen with the provided computer grid and direction indicator.
      Parameter:
      compGrid - The computer grid to display (contains player ships).
      direction - The direction indicator (0 for horizontal, 1 for vertical).

    • drawShipsBuild

      void drawShipsBuild(int[] shipLengths)
      Draws the ship placement screen with the lengths of the ships to be built.
      Parameter:
      shipLengths - An array containing the lengths of the ships to be built.

    • drawPlayScreen

      void drawPlayScreen(Grid playerGrid, Grid computerGrid, Grid invPlayerShipsOnCompGrid, int[] shipLengths)
      Draws the main play screen with player and computer grids, as well as the invisible player ships on the computer grid.
      Parameter:
      playerGrid - The player's grid: player shoot at computer ships on it.
      computerGrid - The computer's grid: computer shoot at player ships on it.
      invPlayerShipsOnCompGrid - The invisible player ships on the computer grid.
      shipLengths - An array containing the lengths of the ships.

    • drawGameOverScreenPlayerWin

      void drawGameOverScreenPlayerWin()
      Draws the game over screen for the player's victory.

    • drawGameOverScreenPlayerLoose

      void drawGameOverScreenPlayerLoose()
      Draws the game over screen for the computer's victory.
